headline.main: NOMURA ANXIOUS TO CLEAR HIMSELF; His Bid to Grew for a Talk Believed Designed to Show He Was Kurusu's Victim U.S. ENVOY SNUBBED HIM Our Ex-Ambassador to Tokyo Refused to Meet Admiral at Lourenco Marques

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, July 31 -- One of the first things the State Department wants to learn from Joseph C. Grew when our former Ambassador to Japan gets back to the United States is whether Admiral Kichisaburo Nomura really gave Mr. Grew the opportunity to snub him at Lourenco Marques.
abstract: Wash qrs believe former Jap Amb to US Nomura eager to clear himself of complicity in Jap-US pre-war confs
